entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Blazor] ::deep does not work in combination with [dir="rtl"] #45138
  • ExceptionHandlerMiddleware should be able to include HTTP Headers from original requests #45137
  • Mechanism for delaying Blazor's first render until after some async operation #45131
    .NET 8 Planning
  • SpaProxy should not inject middleware with ASPNETCORE_HOSTINGSTARTUPASSEMBLIES #45130
  • Add support for url pattern /v1/books/ext-{external_id} in grpc transcoding #45126
  • [Feature Request] JS module adapter for Blazor #45120

Closed

  • TouchActions do not appear to work in Selenium #32373
    8.0-MQ
  • The remote certificate is invalid according to the validation procedure #15105
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Kestrel dev certificate woes #26536
    .NET 7 Planning
  • "SPA default page middleware could not return the default page '/index.html' when index.html is there and site is working as intended. #45135
  • .NET 7 Blazor WASM authentication back button history issue #45097 re-open request #45132
  • dotnet-watch flaky test Run_WithHotReloadEnabled_ReadsLaunchSettings #40740
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Running dotnet watch fails due to System.IO.FileNotFoundException #45129
  • Updated packages for 'Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.*' #45128
  • UserManager.ResetPasswordAsync causes entity to be tracked a second time #45048
  • Blazor WebAssembly lazy loading assemblies not working when using @ref attribute in the component #29342
    Backlog
  • Upgrading Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.NewtonsoftJson from 6 to 7 causes WebRequest to be empty #45124
  • BuildFromSource Windows Activate for VS #45119
  • IHttpContextAccessor.HttContext Session throws Exception when not enabled #45067
  • Web API broken in .NET 7.0 after trimming #44997

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix CookieHeaderParserShared throws exception when last cookie contains invalid character #45014 #45127
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • fix DefaultPolicy unreasonable behavior. #45122
    area-security, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] Use new Arm64 Helix queues #45121
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode

Merged

  • Re-enable Blazor touch event test #45134
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview1
  • Use the Regex source generator in the AlphaRouteConstraint. #44770
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview1
  • [release/3.1] Use simpler Docker tags #45118
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 3.1.x

Updated

  • HttpSys request header dictionary does not remove headers when Remove() is called #44860
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2046770 #44686
    area-infrastructure
